<JD_START>
Job Title: Engineering Project Manager

Location: North Carolina, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Engineering, Project Management

Description:
Mattern & Craig is growing in North Carolina! We are an employee-owned Engineering and Survey Firm looking for talented individuals to join our team in our office locations in Asheville &/or Hickory, NC. The team currently has openings in civil engineering design and project management.
This is a Civil Project Engineer position in the Western North Carolina market. The focus of this position is design and construction document production for transportation engineering, municipal roadway, hydraulic, bridge, and other multi-modal linear or commercial site development based civil projects. Applicants must be proficient with general civil engineering, hydraulics and stormwater management, and environmental permitting processes. The position requires working knowledge of permit & plan preparation using AutoCAD Civil 3D or MicroStation/GeoPAK and application of Municipal & NCDOT design standards and project delivery methodology. Beyond project design, this role includes an opportunity for advancement to project and team management.
Minimum Requirements:NC Registered PE preferred or ability to obtain licensure within 1 yearBSCE from ABET accredited engineering programExcellent engineering design and communication skillsMinimum of 3 years experience in civil engineering and client services
Preferred Skills:Previous municipal client and project development experienceExcellent communication skills and ability to lead a design team is highly valuedEngage in multiple civil design and transportation projectsDesign for site grading & drainage, hydraulics & hydrology calculations, water distribution systems, sanitary collection systems, storage tanks and reservoirs, stormwater infrastructure & treatmentExperience & knowledge of environmental permitting processesMaintain schedules & budgets and provide QA/QC for design criteria and regulatory requirementsCoordination experience with NCDOT, municipal clients, sub-consultants, stakeholders and agencies
Mattern & Craig offers a market competitive salary and full benefits program, including remote work opportunities, flexible Paid Time Off (PTO), and a Professional Development Program (PDP) that develops and trains our team members to advance in their careers. Our Asheville and Hickory offices are experiencing new growth and looking for experienced and motivated individuals to join our team. Mattern & Craig is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
